ExchangeDetailsPage.snapx_overview:
SnapX is a Telegram mini-app platform that allows trading various meme coins issued on the Solana network.
You can receive signals shared by KOLs or directly trade meme coins verified by SnapX via the Alpha-Hunter tab.
ExchangeDetailsPage.snapx_feature: SnapX supports DEX trading, and all trades are executed at market price.

OtherEventsPage.event_1_detail:
Hello, this is the Stacker Team.
On September 05, we are excited to officially release the Stacker MVP! 

This MVP version is designed to help traders:
Easily check exchange referral benefits
Conveniently manage fee paybacks

Moving forward, the Stacker Team will continue to enhance our service by providing:
Integration with more exchanges
A wider range of fee payback policies
A smoother and more user-friendly experience

Your valuable feedback will help Stacker grow and improve.

We sincerely appreciate your support and participation.
Thank you. 

The Stacker Team
OtherEventsPage.event_2_detail:
Hello from the Stacker team!
On September 5th, Stacker‚Äôs MVP was officially released!

This MVP is designed so traders can easily view exchange referral benefits and manage fee paybacks with minimal effort.

Going forward, the Stacker team will continue improving the product by:
- Integrating more exchanges (currently supporting 11 exchanges; 4 more coming soon üöÄ)
Planned exchanges: BlockFin, WeeX, BitMart, Woofi
- Offering a wider range of fee-payback policies
- Providing a smoother and more convenient user experience

Your feedback helps Stacker grow ‚Äî we appreciate your interest and participation.

Thank you,
Sincerely,
The Stacker Team
OtherEventsPage.event_3_title: See you on SnapX and Stacker!
OtherEventsPage.event_3_detail: Hello, this is the Stacker Team. You can now directly access the Meme Coin trading interface, SnapX, on Stacker! SnapX offers a fast and intuitive trading environment dedicated to Meme Coins, built on Telegram. You can receive signals shared by KOLs or trade Meme Coins verified by SnapX through the Alpha-Hunter tab. No installation or complicated steps required, start a brand new trading experience right here on Stacker. Experience the unique trading interface of SnapX today! [Go to SnapX] Thank you, The Stacker Team

AboutUsPage.sign_up_for_an_exchange_with_your_stacke: Sign up for an exchange with your Stacker code
AboutUsPage.stacker_is_a_service_that_returns_a_port:
Stacker is a service that returns a portion of the trading fees charged by exchanges back to users.
Each exchange offers different cashback rates, effectively giving you a discount on fees.
By trading through this platform, users can continuously receive a portion of their fees back as cashback.
AboutUsPage.for_each_exchange_once_a_trade_is_comple:
For each exchange, once a trade is completed, Stacker automatically calculates your cashback based on the transaction records and distributes it.
However, the payment method and timing may vary depending on the exchange.
AboutUsPage.what_if_i_already_have_an_account_on_tha: What if I already have an account on that exchange?
AboutUsPage.you_need_to_sign_up_again_using_a_stacke:
You need to sign up again using a Stacker referral code.
If you have multiple IDs, you can create multiple exchange accounts. So, you can register using a different ID (such as a national ID, driver‚Äôs license, or passport).
AboutUsPage.each_exchange_has_different_registration: Each exchange has different registration policies. For security and regulatory compliance, most exchanges require KYC. Once verified, you can use all services without restrictions, and your personal information is securely protected.
AboutUsPage.do_i_have_to_link_my_exchange_account: Do I have to link my exchange account?
AboutUsPage.yes_you_must_link_your_exchange_account_:
Yes, you must link your exchange account to receive cashback on your fees.
Please note that policies may differ by exchange, so check the integration policy of each exchange for details.
AboutUsPage.transform_your_trading_with_payback: Change the Way You Trade with Cashback

Tired of high trading fees?

Start trading the easy and smart way
with STACKER today.
